availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mordecai E. Twyman (Hart County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Melvina Twyman. Father of Mary M. Twyman, Isham H. Twyman, George Twyman, John T. Twyman, Sallie E. Twyman, Morgan Twyman, and James L. Twyman. Farmer in Hart County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 1, p. 44. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Precinct 3, p. 6. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Hardyville, p. 40. Find A Grave, "Mordecai E. Twyman (1824-1883)," Memorial #76640704, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/76640704/TW (accessed June 5, 2017]).
